desc.en: Jinan Metro is operated by Jinan Rail Transit Group Co., LTD. As of December 2023, there are three lines in operation with a total operating mileage of 84.1 kilometers and 43 stations. Seven lines are under construction, with a total mileage of about 199.91 kilometers and 135 stations.

updateHistory.reason: Fix station name of Jinan West Railway Station. Also unifying station styles and improving alignment near WANGFUZHUANG and YUANBOYUAN.
Update opening status of PEIJIAYING Station.
